---
category: news
title: "Pioneering IAEA Meeting to Focus on AI-Based Approaches in Nuclear Technologies"
excerpt: "The IAEA will hold its first ever technical meeting on artificial intelligence (AI) for nuclear technology and applications from 25 to 29 October 2021. Those interested to participate in the virtual event have until 30 September to submit a completed participation form through their official national authorities and until 31 August to submit their abstracts."
